note.p: Photographic artists of Piccadilly and Gracechurch Street, London, 1856–65; moved to Fulham Road, 1865. A partnership between Henry Maull (1829/30–1914) and George Henry Polyblank (bap. 1831, d. 1868 or later).
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/415/156/50)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1995 (Ancestry.com, accessed 15 September 2022)
London Church of England parish registers London Metropolitan Archives P76/JS1/027 (Ancestry.com, accessed 15 September 2022)
